altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Permit Number associated with the well
name given to the well by DEP or the Operator
name of the current operator for the well
Operator Number associated with the current operator
describes the type of well
current status of the well
code associated with the Well type
date associated with the permit number
drilling commencement date, or proposed drilling commencement date as reported by the operator
indicates whether thie wellbore penetrates the Onondaga horizon as defined in the PA Oil & Gas Conservation Law
county the well is permitted in
code associated to the county
municipality that the well is in
type of municipality that the well is in
code associated to the municipality name
latitude of the well bore hole
longitude of the well bore hole
system generated id associated with the primary facility record for this well in the DEP eFACTS database
indicates whether this is a conventional or unconventional well
name of the well pad on which the well is located
ground elevation at the well head location
indicates the well configuration
indicates if the well is in a coal or non coal region
well plug completion date
Feature geometry.
